articles.title: The Future of Search Technology
articles.author: Dr. Sarah Chen
articles.content: Search technology is evolving rapidly with the integration of AI and machine learning. Vector search and semantic understanding are becoming crucial for next-generation search experiences.

articles.title: OpenSearch vs Elasticsearch: A Comprehensive Comparison
articles.author: Mike Rodriguez
articles.content: An in-depth analysis of OpenSearch and Elasticsearch, comparing features, performance, licensing, and community support to help you make the right choice for your search infrastructure.

articles.title: Building Scalable Search Applications
articles.author: Jennifer Park
articles.content: Best practices for building search applications that can scale to millions of documents and thousands of concurrent users. Covers indexing strategies, query optimization, and infrastructure design.
